name: Aritzia Audit Sampling Rate Update
command:
[select rtstr1,
        rtflt1,
        wh_id
   from poldat_view
  where polcod = 'DSS-ARITZIA'
    and polvar = 'AUDIT'
    and polval = 'SAMPLING-RATE'
    and rtstr1 in ('NP', 'HE', 'ECOM', 'RET')
    and wh_id = 'DC03'] catch(@?)
|
if (@? = 0)
{
    [update poldat
        set rtflt2 = @rtflt1,
            rtflt1 = 0
      where polcod = 'DSS-ARITZIA'
        and polvar = 'AUDIT'
        and polval = 'SAMPLING-RATE'
        and wh_id_tmpl = @wh_id
        and rtstr1 = @rtstr1] catch(@?)
    |
    if (@? = 0)
    {
        write output file
         where filnam = 'audrate_update.log'
           and data = sysdate || ',' || @rtstr1 || ' UPDATED FROM ' || @rtflt1 || ' TO 0'
           and newline = 'Y'
           and mode = 'A'
           and path = '$LESDIR/log'
    }
    else
    {
        write output file
         where filnam = 'audrate_update.log'
           and data = sysdate || ',' || @rtstr1 || ',' || 'UPDATE FAILED'
           and newline = 'Y'
           and mode = 'A'
           and path = '$LESDIR/log'
    }
};
